name: assign_temporary_group_memberships_loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooong_name
title: Assign group memberships temporarily based on time
description:
Within Okta, you may want to give a user group membership, but only for a limited time.
      

 An example would be a group that gives auditors access to applications, but revoked after 30 days.  Another example may be a temporary development project that you want to assign developers access.
